categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Lady Selnia Harbright was a young Human female senator from Salliche, who served in the Imperial Senate of the Galactic Empire. She followed proudly in the footsteps of her family for nearly three centuries. Energetic, intelligent and confident, Selnia was more interested in getting things done than in bland theory.

With Salliche held tight in the Galactic Empire's grip, the Harbright family came to realize that Emperor Palpatine was a tyrant, and that the Rebel Alliance was justified. Following the dissolution of the Imperial Senate in 0 BBY, Selnia served the Alliance in several covert operations, including a supply-gathering mission to Droecil which culminated in a heated confrontation with pirate Black Jack, deep in Keller's Void.
